ImageTrack.summary: The ImageTrack interface of the represents an individual image track.

ImageTrackFrameCount.summary: The frameCount property of the interface returns the number of frames in the track.

ImageTrackSelected.summary: The selected property of the interface returns true if the track is selected for decoding.
ImageTrackSelected.value: A , if true the track is selected for decoding.

ImageTrackRepetitionCount.summary: The repetitionCount property of the interface returns the number of repetitions of this track.

ImageTrackAnimated.summary: The animated property of the interface returns true if the track is animated and therefore has multiple frames.
ImageTrackAnimated.value: A , if true this is an animated track.
